participant_1.background:
My passion is writing but my spelling is terrible, I'm still learning.
i am an amazing dancer.
I am not big on social media because I am not comfortable sharing my personal life with the world.
i am currently looking for a job in baltimore.
i am allergic to shellfish and cats.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about my extensive book collection, which is filled with all the classics and some hidden gems.
I like to play video games to de-stress after a long day of welding.
I work hard to help support my family, even if I'm not always the most graceful.
I spent my days listening to vinyl records and cooking healthy meals for myself.
i live in a small apartment in new york.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi! How are you?
I'm good! Thanks for asking. What about you?
Doing well! Just getting ready for work.
Oh, what do you do for work?
I am a welder.
That's cool! How do you like it?
It's great! I get to be creative and make things with my hands.
That's awesome! I wish I was more creative.
You could be! You just have to find something you're passionate about and then go for it.
Thanks for the advice! I'll try that.
Good luck!
Thanks! What are you doing after work?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll go play some video games or cook dinner.
Sounds fun! I love video games too.
What are your favorite games?
I like a lot of different games, but I'm really into Skyrim right now.
I've never played Skyrim, but I've heard good things about it.
It's really great! It's an open world game where you can do whatever you want.
That sounds awesome! I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun
